[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ContextMenu](./blockly.contextmenu.md)

## ContextMenu namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [callbackFactory(block, state)](./blockly.contextmenu.callbackfactory.md) | Create a callback function that creates and configures a block, then places the new block next to the original and returns it. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.contextmenu.dispose.md) | Dispose of the menu. |
|  [getCurrentBlock()](./blockly.contextmenu.getcurrentblock.md) | Gets the block the context menu is currently attached to. It is not recommended that you use this function; instead, use the scope object passed to the context menu callback. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.contextmenu.hide.md) | Hide the context menu. |
|  [setCurrentBlock(block)](./blockly.contextmenu.setcurrentblock.md) | Sets the block the context menu is currently attached to. |
|  [show(menuOpenEvent, options, rtl, workspace, location)](./blockly.contextmenu.show.md) | Construct the menu based on the list of options and show the menu. |
